thread.title: 9 very bizarre things about the photo of the Nevilles' dinner with David Beckham
thread.title_full: 9 very bizarre things about the photo of the Nevilles' dinner with David Beckham

author: Jon Moody
title: 9 very bizarre things about the photo of the Nevilles' dinner with David Beckham
text:
10 very bizarre things about the photo of the Nevilles' dinner with David Beckham We've got some questions to ask here... Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United fans probably had a little swoon last night. 
Fans always love to see a little reunion between legends, and Paris was the venue for such a meet-up between Old Trafford heroes. 
Gathering for Phil Neville's belated 40th birthday celebrations , he was joined by his brother Gary, some bloke called David Beckham and their mutual friend David Gardner. 
The foursome dined at the Chez l'Ami Louis in Notre Dame, with Gary and David both sharing a moment from the evening on his Instagram. 
A lovely snap of old friends, sure, but there's a few odd things we couldn't help but notice about it... 1) The plate of ketchup on the table 
OK, we can't be 100% certain it is a big dollop of red sauce, but it sure looks like it is. You can take the boys out of Manchester... (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 2) David Beckham hasn't finished eating yet 
Firstly, couldn't the photo wait until after Becks had finished off his course? Secondly, why is he so behind everyone else anyway? (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 3) Phil Neville is dressed for Sixth Form 
Not our words (you like fine to us, Phil) - but a valid observation nevertheless from one Instagram commenter. (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 4) There is a LOT of leftover bread 
There are two theories about this in the photo's comments. One: has it been deliberately left for chip butties once they finish boozing? Two: has Gary used it to create a model of his planned skyscraper to show the boys? (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 5) There's no Scholes or Giggs 
We hope they were invited and simply couldn't make it. Otherwise it's a little awkward... (Photo: John Peters) 6) David Beckham needs a haircut 
We're no fashion gurus, granted, but forgive us for saying that a short back and sides probably wouldn't go amiss for ol' Becks. (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 7) It looks like Phil Neville have two glasses of water 
One in hand, one on the table. The birthday boy is taking absolutely no chances with his body's hydration as he enters his 40s. (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 8) David Beckham had to be the one sat next to the mirror 
Maybe that's be chance, maybe he simply gravitated towards it. Either way, the model of the group is the one able to see his reflection with a mere glance across. (Photo: davidbeckham/Instagram) 9) Who picked up the bill? 
A question we've always wondered when mega rich folk go for dinner, and this is no exception. Do they split it four ways? Do they play a game to decide? Or do they just do a runner?
